JobFullDesc: If you want to play a key role in changing the strategy of selling Surface in the commercial market space, this is your chance. Join the Microsoft Surface Marketing Team. We’re looking for a “geek with speak” to drive technical product marketing efforts that tells the story of Surface + M365 better together, specifically in the areas of deployment, management and security.  We’re in search of a Rockstar that can lead, evangelize and create innovative and scalable content for our technical audience, the largest decision-making audience for Surface commercial. The right candidate will come to the role with technical chops grounded in the areas of Windows Autopilot, Microsoft Endpoint Manager and Windows 10 device security/administration. These technical skills will be backed by a strong story telling capability and the talent to easily adjust the content from level 50 to 300 based on who the audience is.  This is a visible role that will require working closely with Surface engineering, FastTrack teams, content SMEs, Enterprise Sales, Resellers, and most importantly our customers. The best candidate must be obsessed with an outside-in view of the customer experience, possess an attitude of GSD (Getting Stuff Done!), and bring an excellent work ethic.  Being a uber hardware geek won’t hurt either. ResponsibilitiesYou are responsible for creation and delivery of the Surface technical narrative across M365 Deployment, Management and Security. You will form cross functional relationships that work across marketing and engineering within Surface + M365 to create focused content on management and security.    Create content aimed at technical audiences in the scope of Surface deployment, management and security. Own Surface technical GTM experiences & comms. across field, partner, and customer channels. Be a storyteller across several audiences at a variety of internal and external forums. Create technical demo content for internal sellers and partner audiences. Land a solid presence for Surface technically at internal and external events – including Ignite, Build, Ready, Inspire, etc. Lead and guide v-teams to drive cross-group efforts as appropriate. Work alongside sales readiness leads to land technical readiness content for sellers and partners. Provide SME level knowledge to assist channel teams in the build out of a Surface technical competency. QualificationsThe ideal candidate will have 7+ years of experience in product management, product marketing or field technical roles, including product launch experience. Communication: Excellent written and spoken communication skills at all altitudes, with actionable clarity and One Microsoft transparency. Customer and Partner Obsession: Must have deep outside-in empathy for customer and partner experiences and success. Collaboration: Exceptional collaborator and relationship manager on multi-faceted issues that span multi-cultural groups, with the ability to forge relationships that drive results. Basic System Center Configuration Manager experience: In place upgrade, tasks creations, deployment experience with Windows, Office, other apps. Basic Intune technical competency: possess a broad knowledge of Intune or any other mobile device management software. Basic skills in PowerShell, Active Directory, Web Services, troubleshooting and driving adoption across collaborative workloads in O365 like Teams and SharePoint. Cloud competency: broad view of Cloud services and products. Understanding the industry transformation towards “cloud only” services.  Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances.  We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application or the recruiting process, please send a request via the Accommodation request form. Benefits/perks listed below may vary depending on the nature of your employment with Microsoft and the country where you work.
